name: Seehom
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
SeeHom is an IPC camera, you can securely monitor your home by using APP on smartphone or web on PC.

Now, with the skill SeeHom you can open camera stream by voice.

HOW TO GET CONNECTED:
1. Search the "SeeHom" skill on Alexa app
2. Tap the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your SeeHom account and password to link your SeeHom account
4. Select a device to bind
5.After your SeeHom account has been successfully linked. 

TIPS: To use this skill, you need to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the SeeHom App.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, show my camera.
